Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.model

Interface Substitution

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicSubstitution, ExplState, ImmutableValuation, MutableValuation, NestedSubstitution, ParamBinding, SmtLibValuation, Valuation
    public interface Substitution
    Interface for a substitution, which is a mapping from declarations to expressions.
